name: Thailand National Budget (FY2025)
desc: Indicative allocation for FY2025 expressed in million Thai Baht.

children.name: Central Fund (งบกลาง)
children.desc: Contingencies and nationwide programmes managed directly by the central government.

children.name: Emergency and Contingency Reserve
children.desc: Buffer for disasters, epidemics and unforeseen events.

children.desc: Scheduled repayments for state borrowing obligations.

children.desc: Support for price stabilisation, energy subsidies and targeted welfare.

children.desc: Matching funds for mega projects and PPP programmes.

children.name: Personnel and Pension Reserve
children.desc: Severance, pensions and personnel cost adjustments.

children.name: Local Government Transfers
children.desc: Unconditional and conditional grants to provinces, municipalities and tambon administrations.

children.name: General Grants
children.desc: Formula-based transfers to local governments for core services.

children.name: Education & Health Top-ups
children.desc: Funding to align local schools and health centres with national standards.

children.name: Capital Co-investment
children.desc: Matching funds for local infrastructure and transit upgrades.

children.name: Local Innovation Challenge
children.desc: Competitive grants for smart city, tourism and climate projects.
